perfiles.notas:
Order Sergeants - Specialist Sergeants cannot be members of a Fireteam.

Special Fireteam: Up to 1 Order Sergeant can join a Knights Hospitallers or a Teuton Knights Fireteam. Except Crusade Fireteams.

Special Fireteam: Core. Up to 1 Black Friar (Albedo, Biometric Visor L1) can join a Fireteam: Core of Order Sergeants.

Special Fireteam: Core. Father-Knights can join a Fireteam: Core of Order Sergeants.

opciones.nombre: SPEC. SERGEANT (CH: TO Camouflage, Infiltration, Forward Observer)

perfiles.notas:
Special Fireteam: Up to 1 Order Sergeant can join a Knights Hospitallers or a Teuton Knights Fireteam. Except Crusade Fireteams.

Special Fireteam. Magister Knights count as Teuton Knights for Fireteam composition.
Special Fireteam. Magister Knights count as Teuton Knights for Fireteam composition.
Special Fireteam: Core. Father-Knights can join a Fireteam: Core of Order Sergeants.

units.nombre: SERAPHS, Armoured Cavalry of Military Order

perfiles.nombre: SERAPHS, Armoured Cavalry of Military Order

perfiles.notas: Special Fireteam. De Fersen counts as a Knight Hospitaller for Fireteam composition.

Special Fireteam: Core. Crusade Fireteam. Joan of Arc (any version) + 4 Knights Hospitallers.

Example: Joan of Arc (any version) + De Fersen + 1 K. of Santiago + 2 K. Hospitallers.

Special Fireteam. Joan of Arc (any version) can join any Fireteam: Duo of this Sectorial Army.

Special Fireteam: Core. Crusade Fireteam. Joan of Arc (any version) + 4 Knights Hospitallers.

Example: Joan of Arc (any version) + De Fersen + 1 K. of Santiago + 2 K. Hospitallers.

Special Fireteam. Joan of Arc (any version) can join any Fireteam: Duo of this Sectorial Army.
Special Fireteam. Konstantinos (non-Infiltrating option) counts as an Order Sergeant for Fireteam composition.
Special Fireteam: Core. Up to 1 Black Friar (Albedo, Biometric Visor L1) can join a Fireteam: Core of Order Sergeants.
